name: Jar - Parkour/Speedrunning Game
description:
Jar is a Parkour / Speedrunning game.
It is the first game in development of my OpenJar Game.
Jar Has The movement mechanics that OpenJar Will Have.
Open will be a Openworld multiplayer Fighting game based around similar fighting mechanics that Black Desert and Blade and Soul Has.
Then we will put them together In a Open Generated World and We have OpenJar!

Any Bugs with Jar let me know in the comments but there shouldn't be any.

The Paid Jar Game Will have multiplayer and 20+ Maps!

*Update: Will Be Adding 4 more maps to free version
*Note: Does not run well on computers without a dedicated graphics card: Nvidia 760+
